card.title: Description
card.content:
With this functionality you can ...
- create a ray-traced image.

guide.title: Create a ray-trace image of a certain view point

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on :google_material-open_in_new_w200:, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Enter a filename for the image.

details.item: Ray-Tracing an image creates better results but can take a long time to render.
Ray-Tracing has different parameters that can be changed in the settings dialog.
